summary:
**Project X (2012 film)**

"Project X" is a 2012 American comedy film about three friends who throw a party to become popular. Directed by Nima Nourizadeh, the film follows Thomas, Costa, and J.B. as their small get-together turns into a massive, out-of-control event. Shot like a home video, it was made on a $12 million budget and earned $102 million worldwide. Critics didn't like the characters' behavior and how it glamorized drugs. However, some found it funny and compared it to "National Lampoon's Animal House." The film inspired real-life large-scale parties.
title: Project X (2012 film)
